Text:
If you like big boobs and want a turn on (two of these girls have amazing bodies), or you actually have huge boobs and want a solution, check this out!

In my case I'm the former LOL
Two of these women need to lose weight big time. This was immediately obvious to me. They finally mentioned this halfway through the video!

Yet, no one will ever make a serious show called "My Large Penis and Me"
It's such a burden....

Just watched the video, great quality and even a few shots of super, naked boobs.  It was never said that any of these ladies NEEDED to lose weight, merely that weight loss = smaller boobs.  None of these women were even plump.  Two weren't perfect and thin, one really was.  Anyone who thinks any of these women "need to lose weight big time" will never be happy with real women.  Awesome show, stunning boobs.  :-)

Why are these women so sad to have big boobs ?
They live in a country that LOVES boobs so much - I'm confused.... Dynamite Boobies, BTW.
